content:
We are looking to do some analysis on the changes to resources described here : https://onfhir.hl7.org/2016/03/31/may-2016-release/
Is there an easy way to see what has changed on each resource?
There's a compare link on the bottom of each page
Look at some of the initial analysis there seem to be multiple places where the sequencing of elements within a resource has changed. What would motivate such a change?

we got a lot of feedback for DSTU2 that the order of elements between resources was inconsistent, and that it should be consistent. We've been imposing a common order of elements where they have the same meaning for resources. We're trying to get the order consistent early in the FMM status
OK thanks, I wondered if there were any technical reasons, I couldn't think of any - that's because there weren't any.
